title: myTime Watch Face
summary: myTime Watch Face is a simple and clean standalone watch face with calendar
description: Designed for Round and Square devices.Android Wear 2.0 Complications support.Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.If you want to change the background color, for example, you won't need to pick up yourphone, unlock, open the watch face app or Android Wear app, change the background color and then go back to the watch. You can change by long pressing the watch screen, myTime configurationsand then choose a background color.Simple, easy and fast.myTime Watch Face Features:- 4 spaces for Complications (Android Wear 2.0)- Date (Day / Month)- Calendar with multiple colors- Watch Battery- Mobile Battery- More than 15 Background Colors- More than 20 Colors for Numbers and Markers- More than 10 Styles for Markers- More than 10 Fonts for Numbers in Analog Watch- 9 Styles of Hour and Minute Hands- More than 30 Colors for Hour and Minute Hands- More than 25 Colors and 15 Fonts for the Digital WatchNumerous combinations.Ambient Mode   Ambient Mode Settings:      - Date      - Watch Battery      - Mobile Battery      - Digital Watch      - Analog Watch
descriptionHTML:
Designed for Round and Square devices.

Android Wear 2.0 Complications support.

Customize your watch face directly on the watch, in a easy and fast way.

If you want to change the background color, for example, you won't need to pick up your
phone, unlock, open the watch face app or Android Wear app, change the background color and
then go back to the watch. You can change by long pressing the watch screen, myTime configurations
and then choose a background color.
Simple, easy and fast.

myTime Watch Face Features:

- 4 spaces for Complications (Android Wear 2.0)

- Date (Day / Month)

- Calendar with multiple colors

- Watch Battery

- Mobile Battery

- More than 15 Background Colors

- More than 20 Colors for Numbers and Markers

- More than 10 Styles for Markers

- More than 10 Fonts for Numbers in Analog Watch

- 9 Styles of Hour and Minute Hands

- More than 30 Colors for Hour and Minute Hands

- More than 25 Colors and 15 Fonts for the Digital Watch

Numerous combinations.

Ambient Mode
Ambient Mode Settings:
- Date
- Watch Battery
- Mobile Battery
- Digital Watch
- Analog Watch
comments: Oct 2017 Review.  Perfect for what I want. very customizable.  Can have many options for ambient display..  colors and complications.  Only wish i could display more info with digital clock..  but best overall option by far! ** request ** ability to add custom color chooser ?

This is a really good watch face. I just have one question about burn in protection for OLED watches. I am not sure if I can see the watch face shifting around by a couple of pixels or not. Can you help?
Excellent face. Very clean design, with a good range of options and low levels of battery consumption.
Excellent product. Very user friendly. Options all useful. Thanks!

Best watch face have ever used. Have been using watch faces for last 2 years, at last found a watch face which is simple, light and powerful. Thus gives more battery life with all useful features and compilations.  Like the following features the most: 1) calendar in the custom compilation. 2) 13-24 marker  3) digital clock, with actual digital font and color  Great job !
Really like the simplicity of watchface. I would like a choice to show notifications at the bottom along with the number of notifications that haven't been cleared.
recentChanges: Option to hide/show second in digital watch
